constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 201 (Thursday, November 18, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. JACOBS of California:
H.R. 6034.
=========================== NOTE ===========================
On page H6609, November 18, 2021, middle column, the following
language appears: By Ms JACOBS of California: H.R. 6084.
The online version has been corrected to read: By Ms. JACOBS of
California: H.R. 6034.
========================= END NOTE =========================
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Section 8 of Article I of the Constitution.
[Page H6609]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

title: Diplomatic Support and Security Act of 2021
